topics.body:
Too_Offensive was chillin' out in his caddy smokin' on some dank weed with his homie, Carca$$ $trife. "drop it like it's hot" was blastin' from the from the speakers. The woofers was spittin out that dope ass bass line and shit.

"Sheeit, this some dank ass weed", Too_Offensive said puffin' on the fattie.

"Yo, lemme get another puff of that, niggah", Carca$$ said.

"Fuck naw man, you smoked 3/4 of the bag, so fuck you dawg".

Too_Offensive kicked up his feet on the dashboard. He was wearing some sick ass J'S. He reached into his and pulled out a fat stack of benjamins. 

CRASH! The windshield was shattered

WHAT I HAVE so far aFTER 5 minutes of writing lol

topics.body:
I swear I'll shut up about wolf children eventually but I think I just figured out why the ending gets to me so much. 
[spoiler] it's because I would be the clingiest parent ever. Even though the movie assures you multiple times that yuki and ame are both okay and happy, my brain still goes "BUT THEY NEED THEIR MOMMY!" 
I am "this commercial":http://youtu.be/VdyCh5dPkRA [/spoiler]
